page.title: 18A day in the life of Jenny
page.content: I get up at 7.45 am and get ready for school. I go through to the kitchen and have toast with lemon curd. I take that through to the living room, sit at the fire and watch TV-AM until about eight o'clock. I then take my Jack Russell pups out to do their business. By that time it should be 8.10 and my brother and I go up to catch the Western S.M.T. bus to school. You need a season ticket to get on. The bus takes you to Castle Douglas via Clarebrand. We get off at the High School and go into our form class. I wait there until the bell rings, then the teacher comes in to take the register. After a normal school day I get into the bus and go home, get changed, have something to eat and go and help my dad up at the farm. I am 13 years old.
